hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Ice Arrows#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
